attributes.title: 10 Years of RTX
attributes.caption: 10 years of RTX is more than just 10 years of excitement for new and old shows. It’s 10 years of shared memories with our wonderful community of friends and family.
attributes.description: 10 years of RTX is more than just 10 years of excitement for new and old shows. It’s 10 years of shared memories with our wonderful community of friends and family. Thank you for being here with us and making 10 years of beauty and chaos possible. Cheers to another 10 years!

attributes.title: FIRST Night
attributes.caption: Join us for an evening of exclusive reveals, news, and more!
attributes.description: Join us for an evening of exclusive reveals, news, and more!

attributes.title: RWBY
attributes.caption: Join the cast and crew of RWBY for exclusive sneak peeks at Volume 8 and first looks at products from the expanding RWBY universe!
attributes.description: Join the cast and crew of RWBY for exclusive sneak peeks at Volume 8 and first looks at products from the expanding RWBY universe! Writers and directors Kerry Shawcross, Miles Luna and Eddy Rivas and joined by Lead Producer Laura Yates and lead voice actresses Lindsay Jones (Ruby Rose), Kara Eberle (Weiss Schnee), Barbara Dunkelman (Yang Xiao Long) and Arryn Zech (Blake Belladonna).

attributes.title: RT D&D
attributes.caption: Join our merry adventurers as they continue their dungeon going escapades during this episode of RT D&D.
attributes.description: Join our merry adventurers as they continue their dungeon going escapades during this episode of RT D&D.

attributes.title: The Wonderful World of Games Journalism
attributes.caption: How do you balance keeping your fingers on the pulse and on your controller of choice? Enter into the Wonderful World Of Games Journalism to find out! Join a roundtable of diverse industry voices as they discuss the ABCs and NDAs of video game news.
attributes.description: How do you balance keeping your fingers on the pulse and on your controller of choice (or keyboard, we don't discriminate)? Enter into the Wonderful World Of Games Journalism to find out! Join a roundtable of diverse industry voices as they discuss the ABCs and NDAs of video game news: How are ethics responsibly handled in games journalism? What role does editorial play in the video game industry? The entertainment industry? How do you write a catchy headline while sticking to the facts? And how the HECK do these people get any sleep with the never-ending tight turnarounds?? Get all these questions answered and even ask some of your own - just please format them APA style. Wink wink.
attributes.display_title: The Wonderful World of Games Journalism

attributes.title: Achievement Hunter (1st Week)
attributes.caption: We're all stuck at home and that sucks, but at least we can hang out together online! Look on the bright side, you don't have to wait in any lines!
attributes.description: We're all stuck at home and that sucks, but at least we can hang out together online! Look on the bright side, you don't have to wait in any lines!

attributes.title: Women of RT
attributes.caption: Join a few of the amazing Women at Rooster Teeth as they discuss what it means to be a leader at the company, how they've fostered collaboration and creativity, and their instrumental contributions to Rooster Teeth’s ongoing successes and changes.
attributes.description: Join a few of the amazing Women at Rooster Teeth, representing nearly every department at the company, as they take a moment to discuss what it means to be a leader at the company, the various roles they've held, how they've fostered collaboration and creativity, and their instrumental contributions to Rooster Teeth’s and the entertainment industry’s ongoing successes and changes.

attributes.title: RTX Weekend Recap
attributes.caption: Join hosts Melanie and Christian as they recap the announcements, first looks, news, updates, and mayhem from week one of RTX at Home!
attributes.description: Join hosts Melanie and Christian as they recap the announcements, first looks, news, updates, and mayhem from week one of RTX at Home!

attributes.title: Meet the Writers of gen:LOCK Season 2
attributes.caption: Daniel Dominguez , Gavin Hignight, Evan Narcisse, Kristle Peluso and Maasai Singleton talk about the writing process and inspirations behind Season 2 of gen:LOCK, moderated by Dorian Parks, Editor in Chief of Geeks of Color.
attributes.description: Daniel Dominguez , Gavin Hignight, Evan Narcisse, Kristle Peluso and Maasai Singleton talk about the writing process and inspirations behind Season 2 of gen:LOCK, moderated by Dorian Parks, Editor in Chief of Geeks of Color.

attributes.title: Rooster Teeth in your Living Room and Beyond
attributes.caption: Join Gus and Barbara as they chat with RT Product Managers Justin Moreno and John Revels as they talk about all the exciting news to come and take a look back at the roosterteeth.com.
attributes.description: Join Gus and Barbara as they chat with RT Product Managers Justin Moreno and John Revels as they talk about all the exciting news to come and take a look back at the roosterteeth.com.

attributes.title: Red vs. Blue: Zero to Sixty
attributes.caption: Red vs Blue just. Won't. QUIT! Come join us as we race into the latest season! Ride shotgun with the Cast and Crew behind Red vs. Blue: Zero.

attributes.title: RTAA
attributes.caption: While we know you'd love to learn more about the extensive animation process that goes into crafting each episode of RTAA, honestly we're just here to have a good time. Join us as we show you weird videos and gab about the crappy art style.
attributes.description: While we know you'd love to learn more about the extensive animation process that goes into crafting each episode of RTAA, honestly we're just here to have a good time. Join us as we show you weird videos and gab about the crappy art style.

attributes.title: I Am Woman, Hear Me Perform
attributes.caption: Women in Animation Austin presents a panel on voice acting in animation featuring professional voice actresses from the varied world of animation and games!
attributes.description: Women in Animation Austin presents a panel on voice acting in animation featuring professional voice actresses from the varied world of animation and games! Join them to learn more about the voice acting profession and how these women made their careers in entertainment. Featuring G.K. Bowes (Street Fighter V, gen:LOCK), Christine Marie Cabanos (Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion, Recorded by Arizal), Monica Rial (Dragon Ball Super, gen:LOCK) Kdin Jenzen (RWBY) and more, moderated by Chastity Vicencio, Senior Producer at Gamespot.
attributes.display_title: I Am Woman, Hear Me Perform

attributes.title: Superhero Smack Talk Panel!
attributes.caption: Join Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye, Tim Gettys, Dorian Parks, Kayla Milton, Benny Potter and Eric Voss as they discuss all things superheroes: comic books, films, video games, shows! It’ll get loud, it’ll get personal, get your popcorn ready.
attributes.description: Join Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye, Tim Gettys, Dorian Parks, Kayla Milton, Benny Potter and Eric Voss as they discuss all things superheroes: comic books, films, video games, shows! It’ll get loud, it’ll get personal, get your popcorn ready.

attributes.title: Let's Roll Presents: Gettin' Dicey
attributes.caption: If you ever wondered what it would be like if the Achievement Hunters played a table top role playing game in the setting of something like the show Stranger Things, boy have we got a panel for you.
attributes.description: If you ever wondered what it would be like if the Achievement Hunters played a table top role playing game in the setting of something like the show Stranger Things, boy have we got a panel for you.

attributes.title: Community & Coffee
attributes.caption: The RT Community Managers are getting ready for RTX! We’re talking about what’s coming up, how to take care of yourself during this time, and reveal some secrets!
attributes.description: The RT Community Managers are getting ready for RTX! We’re talking about what’s coming up, how to take care of yourself during this time, and reveal some secrets!

attributes.title: TRANSFORMERS: WAR FOR CYBERTRON - The Making of SIEGE
attributes.caption: Join F.J. DeSanto (Showrunner), Matt Murray (Producer), Gavin Hignight (Writer) Ben Montano (Hasbro), and Jack Liang (Polygon Pictures) as they explore the behind-the-scenes journey of the epic latest chapter in the Transformers franchise.
attributes.description: Join F.J. DeSanto (Showrunner), Matt Murray (Producer), Gavin Hignight (Writer) Ben Montano (Hasbro), and Jack Liang (Polygon Pictures) as they explore the behind-the-scenes journey of the epic latest chapter in the Transformers franchise. Includes looks at never-before-seen concept art and other surprises!
attributes.display_title: TRANSFORMERS: WAR FOR CYBERTRON - The Making of SIEGE

attributes.title: Master and Apprentice presented by HBO Max’s Raised by Wolves
attributes.caption: Join Adam and Marcus as they tell stories from the show, answer cosplay and community questions, and premiere a brand new episode of Master and Apprentice featuring HBO Max’s Raised by Wolves before anyone else gets to see it!
attributes.description: Join Adam and Marcus as they tell stories from the show, answer cosplay and community questions, and premiere a brand new episode of Master and Apprentice featuring HBO Max’s Raised by Wolves before anyone else gets to see it!

attributes.title: Hard Mode: Guess Who
attributes.caption: We play games, but with an added difficult, and usually painful, twist. Find out how hard we’ll go for your entertainment.
attributes.description: We play games, but with an added difficult, and usually painful, twist. Find out how hard we’ll go for your entertainment.

attributes.title: Snack Attack 2: The Snackening
attributes.caption: Fast food creations are coming out too fast to keep track of but luckily Michael Jones and Jordan Cwierz are here to eat and judge every new menu item under the sun. Everyone on set tested negative for COVID-19 and appropriate precautions were taken.
attributes.description: Fast food creations are coming out too fast to keep track of but luckily Michael Jones and Jordan Cwierz are here to eat and judge every new menu item under the sun. One has high standards. The other has no taste. Everyone on set tested negative for COVID-19 and appropriate precautions were taken.

attributes.title: Art 2 Art
attributes.caption: Host Yssa Badiola guides Erin Winn and Rachel Doda through your prompts to see if great minds really do draw alike.
attributes.description: Host Yssa Badiola guides Erin Winn and Rachel Doda through your prompts to see if great minds really do draw alike.

attributes.title: The Ship-it Show LIVE! with Tara Strong & Greg Cipes
attributes.caption: Tara Strong and Greg Cipes host a special live edition of The Ship-it Show – their new podcast to talk toons, fandom, cosplay, cons, and, of course, shipping!
attributes.description: Tara Strong and Greg Cipes host a special live edition of The Ship-it Show – their new podcast to talk toons, fandom, cosplay, cons, and, of course, shipping!

attributes.title: Recreyo Live
attributes.caption: Recreyo, a group of friends are thrown into a brand new scenario where they have to survive. The live audience gets to decide what happens to Recreyo on their adventures.
attributes.description: Recreyo, a group of friends are thrown into a brand new scenario where they have to survive. The live audience gets to decide what happens to Recreyo on their adventures.

attributes.title: Funhaus Panel
attributes.caption: Boy, it sure is hot in Austin, Texas! We're happy to be here in the Big Hall Room :tm: (Note to self: remember to revise panel description before March 2020). Plus, the Internet's greatest challenge show returns: It's time for the 20 Second Showdown!
attributes.description:
Boy, it sure is hot in Austin, Texas! We're happy to be here in the Big Hall Room :tm:. Smell our smells, shake our hands, taste our taste. (Note to self: remember to revise panel description before March 2020).
Plus, the Internet's greatest (and drunkest) challenge show returns: It's time for the 20 Second Showdown!

attributes.title: The Model Employees RTX At Home Special! - Model Employees
attributes.caption: Join Tyler Stab, Jacob Fullerton, Cody Hawkins, and Kdin Jenzen as they build model robots!
attributes.description:
When you think of a Model Employee, what do you imagine?
Is it someone who comes to work on time, does what they need to do, and heads home?
Is it someone who goes above and beyond every professional expectation you could imagine?
OR is it someone who shows up to work with a bunch of actual models and says “LET’S BUILD SOME ROBOTS!”
If you desperately wish that a Model Employee meant the latter option, you’re in luck! Because Tyler Stab, Jacob Fullerton, Cody Hawkins, and Kdin Jenzen are exactly that!
They may not be the best or the brightest… but they are absolutely Rooster Teeth’s MODEL EMPLOYEES!
attributes.display_title: The Model Employees RTX At Home Special! - Model Employees

attributes.title: Inside Gaming
attributes.caption: Come hang out with the Inside Gaming team as they walk you through what it takes to pump out daily news every day! From the early morning writing process to the editing shenanigans, we'll show you each itty bitty step with some surprises along the way.
attributes.description: The lovable zoomers of Inside Gaming are here to TELL THE NEWS! Just kidding, we're all circling the 30 drain, Brian and Patrick are like a million years old collectively, ANYWAY. Come hang out with us as we walk you through what it takes to pump out daily news every day! From the early morning writing process to the editing shenanigans, we'll show you each itty bitty step with some surprises along the way. You'll even get to ask us questions in a Q&A section at the end! Just please, for the love of video games and gamers everywhere, do not ask us where Lawrence is

attributes.title: Castle Super Beast
attributes.caption: Woolie and Pat from Castle Super Beast will be live at RTX 2020, shooting the shit, answering bad questions and using unforgivable videogame metaphors. You should probably be there!
attributes.description: Woolie and Pat from Castle Super Beast will be live at RTX 2020, shooting the shit, answering bad questions and using unforgivable videogame metaphors. You should probably be there!

attributes.title: RWBY: The Grimm Campaign
attributes.caption: Dungeons & Dragons meets RWBY in this new series from Rooster Teeth. Catch up with the hosts as they chat about how the series came to life and why they love D&D so much!
attributes.description: Dungeons & Dragons meets RWBY in this new series from Rooster Teeth. Catch up with the hosts as they chat about how the series came to life and why they love D&D so much!

attributes.title: RWBY & gen:LOCK x Scholastic: Meet the Authors
attributes.caption: Meet with the authors of the new young-adult novels RWBY: Fairy Tales of Remnant and genLOCK: Storm Warning. Hear the inspiration behind the books with surprising secrets to be revealed!
attributes.description: Meet with the authors of the new young-adult novels RWBY: Fairy Tales of Remnant and genLOCK: Storm Warning. Hear the inspiration behind the books with surprising secrets to be revealed!
attributes.display_title: RWBY & gen:LOCK x Scholastic: Meet the Authors

attributes.title: True Crime Podcast Panel
attributes.caption: How to have fun while talking about murderous cults, plane crashes, and conspiracies. Join the hosts of the popular true crime podcasts Red Web, Black Box Down, and Cult Podcast as they detail their experiences making entertaining content about tragedy.
attributes.description: How to have fun while talking about murderous cults, plane crashes, conspiracies, and other awful things. Join the hosts of the popular true crime podcasts Red Web, Black Box Down, and Cult Podcast as they detail their experiences making entertaining content about tragedy. What makes a good episode topic? How do they determine what's appropriate to joke about? How much research goes into each episode? What advice would they give to people interested in starting a podcast?

attributes.title: Recorded by Arizal
attributes.caption: Learn about the world of Maktaba through Arizal's eyes as she records her journey into adulthood. Come for exclusive never-before-seen content and start your journey of discovery with us.
attributes.description: Learn about the world of Maktaba through Arizal's eyes as she records her journey into adulthood. Come for exclusive never-before-seen content and start your journey of discovery with us.

attributes.title: Thank you for 10 years of RTX!
attributes.caption: Every RTX brings a new, exciting experience and RTX at Home did not disappoint! Thanks for being a part of this amazing community and making our 10th RTX and first virtual show a massive success.
attributes.description: Every RTX brings a new, exciting experience and RTX at Home did not disappoint! Thanks for being a part of this amazing community and making our 10th RTX and first virtual show a massive success.
attributes.display_title: Thank you for 10 years of RTX!
